home.title: Welcome to PlanningPokerApp
home.description: Free and open-source web application for Planning Poker, designed to estimate user stories in Agile/Scrum teams. Create a session and invite your team members to estimate user stories efficiently.

card-picker.text-session-not-started: Session not ready for Voting! Wait for moderator to start
card-picker.text-click-to-vote: Click on the card to vote
